Package cs2030.simulator

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs2030.simulator.Server
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SelfCheckoutCounter
    public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
    Server that stores its own state and the queuing customers. Expose a group of getters and setters to change its state in EventSimulator.

    It has one public static field: numOfServers that keeps track of the number of servers so that we can assign IDs properly.

    It has seven private fields: (1) an int serverID (2) a boolean isServing indicating its availability (3) a double nextServiceTime (4) a Queue waitingQueue with customers in queue (5) a double restingProbability (6) a boolean isResting also indicating its availability (7) an int queueLength indicating its maximum queue length

    It has three protected fields: (1) a boolean needRest, because SelfCheckoutCounter needs to inherit it from this class. (2) randomRestSupplier, received from EventSimulator to avoid cyclic dependency (3) restPeriodSupplier, received from EventSimulator to avoid cyclic dependency
